headline: The TJX Companies, Inc. Announces Quarterly Common Stock Dividend
summary: FRAMINGHAM, Mass., December 09, 2024--The TJX Companies, Inc. (NYSE: TJX) today announced the declaration of a quarterly dividend on its common stock of $.375 per share payable March 6, 2025, to shareholders of record on February 13, 2025.

headline: Retail Sector Earnings Roundup: Analyzing The Holiday Season Winners And Losers
summary: The holiday shopping season is progressing on a strong note, with record sales on Black Friday & Cyber Monday. Find out an earnings review of the retail sector.
